path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Titan War Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Wrong total supply restriction
findings.description: The function Distribute() checks that totalDistributed < totalSupply, but should check totalDistributed + _amount < totalSupply.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function DistributeAirdropMultiple() uses a loop for distributing tokens as airdrop, which may cause out of gas issues.

findings.title: Wrong total supply restriction
findings.description: The function Distribute() checks that totalDistributed < totalSupply, but should check totalDistributed + _amount < totalSupply.

findings.title: getTokens function errors
findings.description: bonusCond1 = bonusCond2 = bonusCond3, so all the conditions will not work as expected.
